column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLEmbrace a limitless career with this Master’s programme where health, digital innovation and the start-up world collide, empowering you to apply an enterprising approach to improve the world of health.About this degreeThis unique programme that spans across health, business and innovation has been crafted by academics and industry experts at the world’s first business school dedicated to health. Taught from a global top 10 university, our Digital Health and Entrepreneurship MSc offers an unparalleled opportunity to learn from the best, secure your future employability and contribute to a healthier future society.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
